00022 const unsigned int DEFAULT_MAX_CONNECTIONS = 0;
00023 const unsigned int DEFAULT_MIN_CONNECTIONS = 1;
00024 
00025 // The contructor
00026 Transactional::TransTypeDef::TransTypeDef(QDomNode &transTypeNode):
00027                                 typeName_(), constrained_(false), typeDefinitions_() {
00028 
00029         for (int i = 0; i < transTypeNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00030                 QDomNode tempNode = transTypeNode.childNodes().at(i);
00031 
00032                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:typeName")) {
00033                         Transactional::TransTypeDef::typeName_ =
00034                                         tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00035 
00036                         // get the attributes
00037                         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = tempNode.attributes();
00038 
00039                         // get the value as QString
00040                         QString constrainedStr = attributeMap.namedItem(QString(
00041                                         "spirit:constrained")).childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00042 
00043                         // convert QString -> boolean
00044                         Transactional::TransTypeDef::constrained_ =
00045                                         General::str2Bool(constrainedStr, false);
00046                 }
00047 
00048                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:typeDefinition")) {
00049                         Transactional::TransTypeDef::typeDefinitions_.append(
00050                                         tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00051                 }
00052         }
00053 
00054         // if mandatory element is missing
00055         if (Transactional::TransTypeDef::typeName_.isNull()) {
00056                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:typeName"
00057                                 " missing in spirit:transTypeDef"));
00058         }
00059         return;
00060 }
00061 
00062 Transactional::Transactional(QDomNode &transactionalNode): transTypeDef_(0),
00063                 allLogicalInitiativesAllowed_(false),
00064                 maxConnections_(DEFAULT_MAX_CONNECTIONS),
00065                 minConnections_(DEFAULT_MIN_CONNECTIONS),
00066                 serviceInitiative_(General::NONE), serviceTypeDefs_() {
00067 
00068         for (int i = 0; i < transactionalNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00069                 QDomNode tempNode = transactionalNode.childNodes().at(i);
00070 
00071                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:transTypeDef")) {
00072                         transTypeDef_ = QSharedPointer<TransTypeDef>(
00073                                         new TransTypeDef(tempNode));
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 // parse the spirit:service element within this class
00077                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:service")) {
00078                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00079 
00080                                 if (tempNode.childNodes().at(j).nodeName() ==
00081                                                 QString("spirit:serviceTypeDefs")) {
00082 
00083                                         // go through each serviceTypeDef
00084                                         for (int k = 0;
00085                                                         k < tempNode.childNodes().at(j).childNodes().at(k).
00086                                                                         childNodes().count(); ++k) {
00087                                                 QDomNode serviceNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j).
00088                                                                 childNodes().at(k);
00089                                                 serviceTypeDefs_.append(
00090                                                                 QSharedPointer<ServiceTypeDef>(
00091                                                                                 new ServiceTypeDef(serviceNode)));
00092                                         }
00093                                 }
00094 
00095                                 else if (tempNode.childNodes().at(j).nodeName() ==
00096                                                 QString("spirit:initiative")) {
00097                                         serviceInitiative_ = General::str2Initiative(tempNode.
00098                                                         childNodes().at(j).childNodes().at(0).nodeValue(),
00099                                                         General::NONE);
00100                                 }
00101                         }
00102                 }
00103 
00104                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:connection")) {
00105 
00106                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00107 
00108                                 if (tempNode.childNodes().at(j).nodeName() ==
00109                                                 QString("spirit:maxConnections")) {
00110                                         bool ok = false;
00111                                         maxConnections_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(j).childNodes().
00112                                                         at(0).nodeValue().
00113                                                         toInt(&ok);
00114 
00115                                         // if conversion failed
00116                                         if (!ok) {
00117                                                 maxConnections_ = DEFAULT_MAX_CONNECTIONS;
00118                                         }
00119                                 }
00120                                 else if (tempNode.childNodes().at(j).nodeName() ==
00121                                                 QString("spirit:minConnections")) {
00122                                         bool ok = false;
00123                                         minConnections_ = tempNode.
00124                                                         childNodes().at(j).childNodes().at(0).
00125                                                         nodeValue().toInt(&ok);
00126 
00127                                         // if conversion failed
00128                                         if (!ok) {
00129                                                 minConnections_ = DEFAULT_MIN_CONNECTIONS;
00130                                         }
00131                                 }
00132                         }
00133                 }
00134         }
00135 
00136         // if mandatory element initiative was not defined
00137         if (serviceInitiative_ == General::NONE) {
00138                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:initiative"
00139                                 " missing in spirit:service"));
00140         }
00141         return;
00142 }

00144 Transactional::Transactional( const Transactional &other ):
00145 transTypeDef_(),
00146 allLogicalInitiativesAllowed_(other.allLogicalInitiativesAllowed_),
00147 maxConnections_(other.maxConnections_), 
00148 minConnections_(other.minConnections_),
00149 serviceInitiative_(other.serviceInitiative_),
00150 serviceTypeDefs_() {
00151 
00152         if (other.transTypeDef_) {
00153                 transTypeDef_ = QSharedPointer<TransTypeDef>(
00154                         new TransTypeDef(*other.transTypeDef_.data()));
00155         }
00156 
00157         foreach (QSharedPointer<ServiceTypeDef> typeDef, other.serviceTypeDefs_) {
00158                 if (typeDef) {
00159                         QSharedPointer<ServiceTypeDef> copy = QSharedPointer<ServiceTypeDef>(
00160                                 new ServiceTypeDef(*typeDef.data()));
00161                         serviceTypeDefs_.append(copy);
00162                 }
00163         }
00164 }
00165 
00166 Transactional& Transactional::operator=( const Transactional &other ) {
00167         if (this != &other) {
00168                 allLogicalInitiativesAllowed_ = other.allLogicalInitiativesAllowed_;
00169                 maxConnections_ = other.maxConnections_;
00170                 minConnections_ = other.minConnections_;
00171                 serviceInitiative_ = other.serviceInitiative_;
00172 
00173                 if (other.transTypeDef_) {
00174                         transTypeDef_ = QSharedPointer<TransTypeDef>(
00175                                 new TransTypeDef(*other.transTypeDef_.data()));
00176                 }
00177                 else
00178                         transTypeDef_ = QSharedPointer<TransTypeDef>();
00179 
00180                 serviceTypeDefs_.clear();
00181                 foreach (QSharedPointer<ServiceTypeDef> typeDef, other.serviceTypeDefs_) {
00182                         if (typeDef) {
00183                                 QSharedPointer<ServiceTypeDef> copy = QSharedPointer<ServiceTypeDef>(
00184                                         new ServiceTypeDef(*typeDef.data()));
00185                                 serviceTypeDefs_.append(copy);
00186                         }
00187                 }
00188         }
00189         return *this;
00190 }
00191 
00192 Transactional::~Transactional() {
00193         serviceTypeDefs_.clear();
00194 }

00196 void Transactional::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00197         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:transactional");
00198         writer.writeAttribute("spirit:allLogicalInitiativesAllowed",
00199                         General::bool2Str(allLogicalInitiativesAllowed_));
00200 
00201         // if spirit:transTypeDef is defined
00202         if (transTypeDef_) {
00203                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:transTypeDef");
00204 
00205                 // if mandatory typeName is not found
00206                 if (transTypeDef_->typeName_.isEmpty()) {
00207                         throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory typeName missing in "
00208                                         "spirit:transTypeDef"));
00209                 }
00210                 else {
00211                         // start the spirit:typeName tag
00212                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:typeName");
00213 
00214                         // write the attributes for the element
00215                         writer.writeAttribute("spirit:constrained",
00216                                         General::bool2Str(transTypeDef_->constrained_));
00217 
00218                         // write the value of the element and close the tag
00219                         writer.writeCharacters(transTypeDef_->typeName_);
00220                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:typeName
00221                 }
00222 
00223                 // write all typeDefinitions
00224                 for (int i = 0; i < transTypeDef_->typeDefinitions_.size(); ++i) {
00225                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:typeDefinition",
00226                                         transTypeDef_->typeDefinitions_.at(i));
00227                 }
00228 
00229                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:transTypeDef
00230         }
00231 
00232         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:service");
00233 
00234         // if mandatory spirit:initiative is not defined
00235         if (General::Initiative2Str(serviceInitiative_).isEmpty()) {
00236                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Invalid service initiative defined in"
00237                                 " spirit:service"));
00238         }
00239         else {
00240                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:initiative",
00241                                 General::Initiative2Str(serviceInitiative_));
00242         }
00243 
00244         if (serviceTypeDefs_.size() != 0) {
00245                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:serviceTypeDefs");
00246 
00247                 // write each service type def
00248                 for (int i = 0; i < serviceTypeDefs_.size(); ++i) {
00249                         serviceTypeDefs_.at(i)->write(writer);
00250                 }
00251                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:serviceTypeDefs
00252         }
00253 
00254         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:service
00255 
00256         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:connection");
00257         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:maxConnections",
00258                         QString::number(maxConnections_));
00259         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:minConnections",
00260                         QString::number(minConnections_));
00261         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:connection
00262 
00263         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:transactional
00264 }

00266 void Transactional::setServiceInitiative(General::Initiative
00267                 &serviceInitiative) {
00268         if (serviceInitiative == General::NONE) {
00269                 throw std::invalid_argument("Invalid value given to "
00270                                 "serviceInitiative");
00271         }
00272         serviceInitiative_ = serviceInitiative;
00273 }

00306 void Transactional::setTransTypeDef(TransTypeDef *transTypeDef) {
00307         // delete the old transTypeDef
00308         if (transTypeDef_) {
00309                 transTypeDef_.clear();
00310         }
00311 
00312         // save the new transTypeDef
00313         transTypeDef_ = QSharedPointer<TransTypeDef>(transTypeDef);
00314 }
